tossup_question: -   –  In the Bohr model of the hydrogen atom, the energies of the allowed electronic states are inversely proportional to which of the following?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Planck’s constant
X) The spin quantum number
Y) The principal quantum number
Z) The square of the principal quantum number
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Z) THE SQUARE OF THE PRINCIPAL QUANTUM NUMBER
bonus_question: -   –  Consider an arbitrary one-step polar reaction where an electrophile E and a nucleophile N react to form a single adduct. Let HOMO [hoe-moe] signify highest-occupied molecular orbital, and LUMO [lou-moe] signify lowest unoccupied molecular orbital. Which of the following is true?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) The HOMO of N interacts with the LUMO of E
X) The HOMO of E interacts with the LUMO of N
Y) The HOMO of N interacts with the HOMO of E
Z) The LUMO of N interacts with the LUMO of E
bonus_answer: ANSWER: W) THE HOMO OF N INTERACTS WITH THE LUMO OF E
